title: Rassegna Stampa - Università degli Studi di Urbino - UniUrb
snippet: This press review mentions Fabio Giglietto's participation in the first meeting of the 12 research groups chosen by the Social Science Research Council to study the role of social media platforms in electoral processes, held at Facebook's campus in Menlo Park, California.
description: This press review from the University of Urbino mentions Fabio Giglietto's participation in a Social Science Research Council meeting at Facebook's campus regarding social media platforms and electoral processes, indicating his expertise in social media and digital communication research.

Who is behind vera.ai? Meet the people and teams that make up the vera.ai project. #8 Team of University of Urbino Carlo Bo
snippet: This article introduces the University of Urbino Carlo Bo team involved in the vera.ai project, which includes Fabio Giglietto as the team leader. The team's objective is to discover potentially problematic content in near-real-time using a content-agnostic approach, focusing on coordinated sharing behavior.
description: This article introduces the University of Urbino Carlo Bo team involved in the vera.ai project, led by Fabio Giglietto, which focuses on detecting potentially problematic content in near-real-time using a content-agnostic approach.

title: Fabio Giglietto - Festival Internazionale del Giornalismo
snippet: Fabio Giglietto is a researcher at the Department of Communication Sciences, Humanities and International Studies at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo where he teaches Social Media Analysis. He has published on these topics in journals such as Journal of Communication, Information, Communication and Society, Journal of Broadcasting and Electronic Media, Social Media + Society and International Journal of Communication. Since 1997 he has been a member of the LaRiCA research laboratory and since 2010 he has been coordinating the NEWS-ITALIA project dedicated to the analysis of the transformations of news consumption in our country.
description: This page from the Festival Internazionale del Giornalismo lists Fabio Giglietto as a speaker, detailing his affiliation with the University of Urbino and his expertise in social media analysis.
